name: Magia y Demonios
storyline:
Tired of the shortages, a young man decided to acquire the power of the ancient necromancer. But power ended up dominating him.
Summoning demonic creatures at his path, he set out on a journey towards the temple of the masters, to open the very gates of hell.
Let's hope things don't get worse...
summary:
Challenge the forces of evil in a world where misery spreads. Clear the world of demons with your bow, protect yourself with strong armor while swinging your sword, or cast powerful spells.

The game tells the story of a needy young man, who, far from thinking about the consequences, decided to take the easy way. Leaving behind him demons as a result of the force of evil that took hold of him.
